about_the_game:
Ortharion: The Last Battle is a solo hack'n slash RPG set in a fantasy medieval world. Choose from various combinations of classes and equipment to become as powerful as possible, explore a vast world, and overcome all the toughest challenges and bosses!

Class Evolution: Start with one of the three available classes at the beginning of the game, and gradually select new classes that provide different advantages, ultimately choosing seven specialties simultaneously from a pool of thirty-nine, leading to nearly infinite possibilities.

Over 350 Upgradeable Spells: Spells must be found and learned, and they come in six rarity types and can be leveled up. Learning requires specific stats and classes. The functioning of spells is then modified by talents and equipment.

15 Major Bosses to Face: Bosses are divided into two categories: regular bosses that serve as minor challenges and 15 major bosses that leave little room for error. Not all major bosses are equal.

Explore the World: Enhance your character by exploring and uncover all the secrets it contains.

Procedurally Generated Items: Each item can have unique powers, belong to a set, feature a runic word or a gem, making the number of combinations greater than in other hack'n slash games. Stats are also randomized and tiered. A consumable-based customization system is also available.

Talent Trees: Each fragment of Ortharion gives you a point in talent trees, allowing for further customization of your character. The talent trees are specific to each class, with some talents completely altering gameplay.

Competitive Modes: The game has been designed with a ranking system. You need to accumulate points and can compare them with friends or the community through a seasonal system.

High-Level Content: Participate in multiple high-level systems while engaging in the campaign, boss arenas, monster waves, random dungeons, objective protection, and more.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows Vista, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.3GHz or faster processor (Intel 2nd generation core i-series or equivalent)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: I5 2.9GHz (intel 5th generation core i-series or equivalent)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Ortharion: The Last Battle is a hack'n slash RPG that immerses you in a medieval fantasy world full of secrets. Customize your hero by combining classes, equipment and spells to create unique synergies to face formidable bosses to prove your strength.
